amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part A of House Report 118-108 to amend the definition of 'rule' to include interpretative rules, general statements of policy, and all other agency guidance documents.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Joyce (OH) amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Joyce (OH).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Joyce (OH) amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
